channel.title: Comments on: Morgan Stanley Online Account

item.title: By: John Brunner
item.dc:creator: John Brunner
item.description: Your client server site is the worst site to get into' Why didn't you leave it alone. eEvery time I try to enter I get a message that my username or password is incorrect and it has never changed since I opened the account, what gives
item.content:encoded: Your client server site is the worst site to get into’ Why didn’t you leave it alone. eEvery time I try to enter I get a message that my username or password is incorrect and it has never changed since I opened the account, what gives

item.title: By: John Brunner
item.dc:creator: John Brunner
item.description: Your client server site is the worst site to get into' Why didn't you leave it alone. eEvery time I try to enter I get a message that my username or password is incorrect and it has never changed since I opened the account, what gives
item.content:encoded: Your client server site is the worst site to get into’ Why didn’t you leave it alone. eEvery time I try to enter I get a message that my username or password is incorrect and it has never changed since I opened the account, what gives

item.title: By: Janet K. Hettick
item.dc:creator: Janet K. Hettick
item.description: Why is it so impossible to get on your site and check my stocks?
item.content:encoded: Why is it so impossible to get on your site and check my stocks?

item.title: By: Michael Schwartz
item.dc:creator: Michael Schwartz
item.description: Wife Judy and I will be visiting our attorney for review of our final wills. We would like to have a current statement of our account in contrast to where we were las yeare at this time.
item.content:encoded: Wife Judy and I will be visiting our attorney for review of our final wills. We would like to have a current statement of our account in contrast to where we were las yeare at this time.

item.title: By: Laurence F. Valle
item.dc:creator: Laurence F. Valle
item.description: Every time you require me to change my password, there's a screw up and I can't get into my account. Fix it or I'm closing my account. This is ridiculous.
item.content:encoded: Every time you require me to change my password, there’s a screw up and I can’t get into my account. Fix it or I’m closing my account. This is ridiculous.

item.title: By: Dennis Trager
item.dc:creator: Dennis Trager
item.description:
I don't know why you changed the login to see my account balances on Morgan Stanley. All of a sudden I get sent to a screen that tells me how to set up CLIENTSERV.
Help!
item.content:encoded:
I don’t know why you changed the login to see my account balances on Morgan Stanley. All of a sudden I get sent to a screen that tells me how to set up CLIENTSERV.

Help!
